summary: Elizabeth J. Palmer was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is mentioned in payroll and certification reports from April 1978, August 1978, and December 1978. These documents list her name, salary, and employment dates within the SCAS.
significance: Elizabeth J. Palmer's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though the specific nature or extent of her role is not detailed in these documents.
